message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV 

This paper deals with multi-label classification and learning vector representations of a label space given a hierarchy of labels. The paper focuses on exploiting hierarchical structures over labels, which is a common problem in natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also uses machine learning techniques to learn vector representations, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with regularities among labels, which is a common problem in artificial intelligence (AI) and information retrieval (IR) tasks, making cs.AI and cs.IR likely sub-categories as well.
